dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank dataset contains movie reviews crawled from Rotten Tomato, with a training set of 8539 sentences and a testing set of 1101 sentences. It has a vocabulary size of 18193 and categorizes sentiments into 5 categories ranging from most negative to most positive.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment Treebank

dcterms:creator: Richard Socher
Alex Perelygin
Jean Wu
Jason Chuang
Christopher D Manning
Andrew Ng
Christopher Potts
dcterms:description: The Twitter sentiment analysis dataset contains 50248 tweets crawled from Twitter, with half used for training and half for testing. It is a binary classification problem with only 2 sentiments: positive and negative.
dcterms:title: Twitter sentiment analysis dataset
